languages.text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.
languages.original_text: Общительность (ОБЩ) — ключевая характеристика офицера, которая усиливает решимость персонажа. Также она влияет на множество навыков, включая Напор, Убеждение и Коммерцию.

traits.locale_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Leaders and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion and Commerce.
Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.
Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

languages.text: La Empatía (EMP) es vital para los oficiales y refuerza la firmeza de los personajes. También afecta a muchas habilidades, como Coacción, Persuasión y Comercio.
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: La Empatía (EMP) es vital para los Líderes y refuerza el brío de los personajes. También afecta a muchas habilidades, como Coacción, Persuasión y Comercio.

languages.text: 社交是军官的核心属性，可以提高角色的决心。此外，社交还会影响一系列技能，包括胁迫、劝说与商业技能。
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: 社交是领袖的核心属性，可以提高角色的决心。此外，社交还会影响一系列技能，包括胁迫、劝说与商业技能。

languages.text: 連帯（FEL）はリーダーの中心となるステータスであり、キャラクターの決断力を高める。また、威圧、説得、商取引など、幅広いスキルに影響する。
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: 連帯（FEL）はリーダーの中心となるステータスであり、キャラクターの決断力を高める。また、威圧、説得、商取引など、幅広いスキルに影響する。

languages.text: Gefolgschaft (GEF) ist ein zentraler Wert für Offiziere und erhöht die Entschlossenheit von Charakteren. Dies wirkt sich auch auf eine Vielzahl von Fertigkeiten aus, darunter Zwang, Überredung und Handel.
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: Gefolgschaft (GEF) ist ein zentraler Wert für Anführer und erhöht die Entschlossenheit von Charakteren. Dies wirkt sich auch auf eine Vielzahl von Fähigkeiten aus, darunter Zwang, Überredung und Handel.

languages.text: La Sociabilité (SOC) est une statistique essentielle des officiers, qui renforce la détermination des personnages. Elle se répercute également sur un large éventail de compétences (Intimidation, Persuasion, Commerce, etc.).
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: La Sociabilité (SOC) est une statistique essentielle des officiers, qui renforce la détermination des personnages. Elle se répercute également sur un large éventail de compétences (Intimidation, Persuasion, Commerce, tec.).

La Sociabilité (SOC) est une statistique essentielle des Leaders et elle renforce la détermination des personnages. Elle se répercute également sur un large éventail de compétences, telles que Intimidation, Persuasion et Commerce.

languages.text: Общительность (ОБЩ) — ключевая характеристика офицера, которая усиливает решимость персонажа. Также она влияет на множество навыков, включая Напор, Убеждение и Коммерцию.
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.

traits.locale_text: Общительность (ОБЩ) — ключевая характеристика лидера, которая усиливает решимость персонажа. Также она влияет на множество навыков, включая Напор, Убеждение и Коммерцию.

languages.text: Sosyallik (SYL), Subaylar için vazgeçilmez bir niteliktir ve karakterlerin kararlılığını artırır. Ayrıca Gözdağı, İkna ve Tecim dâhil olmak üzere geniş bir yetenek yelpazesine etki eder.
languages.original_text: Fellowship (FEL) is a core stat for Officers and increases characters' resolve. It also affects a wide range of skills, including Coercion, Persuasion, and Commerce.
